channel.title: Need Source editing help
channel.description:
OK so I know this seems noobish but its really driving me crazy!
So I'm trying to make myself owner on a basic 317 testscape source and every time I edit the character rights I log in and it automatically goes back to 0! I tried every thing! I even tried editing the .dat file but its encrypted :( UGH please help!

item.title: Need Source editing help
item.dc:creator: @jamessemple jamessemple
item.description:
@jamessemple wrote:

[quote=“pkinnubpk, post:2, topic:312416”]Okay if it is a normal source you should be able to edit that like this…

Go to your source file> characters> the name of character you want owner rites to and change this:

character-rights = 3

(The server mite be really old and might just have instead of 3 try 2)[/quote]
no, i remember having the same problem as a noob and never was able to fix it… i could now but u might as well get a new source :\ or instead of using playerights in client.java assign special commands for your playername

Read full topic

item.title: Need Source editing help
item.dc:creator: @pkinnubpk pkinnubpk
item.description:
@pkinnubpk wrote:

Okay if it is a normal source you should be able to edit that like this…

Go to your source file> characters> the name of character you want owner rites to and change this:

character-rights = 3

(The server mite be really old and might just have instead of 3 try 2)

Read full topic
